title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
• Led elements of critical corporate spin-off preparations, taking on additional responsibilities in overseeing team's deliverables and 6-month direction
  • Designed transition plan to full GitOps infrastructure model, accounting for existing cloud resources and ongoing migrations, to ensure uninterrupted service for 100+ applications
  • Onboarded new engineers to team, and mentored several junior developers new to cloud technologies

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
• Designed and implemented an infrastructure-as-code templating system, reducing development time from weeks to days
  • Fully automated the deployment process for new applications, eliminating manual efforts and reducing turnaround times by 75%
  • Directed operations team in migration efforts, moving over 80 business applications to the cloud

title: Digital Technology Leadership Program
description:
• GE’s premier talent development program focusing on technical skills and project management
  • Developed API for dynamically starting EC2 instances to process large-scale compute jobs, involving millions of technician records and machine sensor data
  • Completed 4 rotations including full stack development, data analysis, and worldwide product deployments

title: Software Developer (Co-op)
description:
• Led team for Alexa voice integration MVP for monitoring agile sprints/task events from planning tool
  • Built backend REST API for interfacing between personnel management application and HR databases
  • Took initiative in proposing, organizing, and leading site-wide engagement events with 100+ participants

title: Full Stack Developer (Co-op)
description:
• Developed new features on ASP.NET web application in an accelerated environment
  • Enhanced user experience and reduced page reload frequency significantly (30% improvement)
  • Implemented asynchronous actions throughout the site, utilizing ASP’s update objects and AJAX
